hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{4-4}&\blue{=1}\\
\blue{0}&\blue{=1}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $0$ is not the same as $1$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{1+2}&\purple{=12}\\
\purple{3}&\purple{=12}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $3$ is not the same as $12$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{10+2}&\pink{=12}\\
\pink{12}&\pink{=12}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $12$ is the same as $12$.
